description: Allows the entity to move in random directions like a slime.
title: Slime Random Direction

add_random_time_range.title: Add Random Time Range
add_random_time_range.description: Additional time (in whole seconds), chosen randomly in the range of [0, 'add_random_time_range'], to add to 'min_change_direction_time'.

turn_range.title: Turn Range
turn_range.description: Maximum rotation angle range (in degrees) when randomly choosing a new direction.

min_change_direction_time.title: Minimum Change Direction Time
min_change_direction_time.description: Constant minimum time (in seconds) to wait before choosing a new direction.
